channel.title: Posts on Andr01d Rocks
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Andr01d Rocks

item.title: Android Sunday: Malware Analysis 1
item.description: Malware Sundays Sundays usually are days I am more relaxed from work and I like to do things that I find interesting. Follow my journey of android Malware Analysis every sunday (or most of them). Summary Finding interesting malware samples can be a hard task since most of them are very basic yet effective. Luckily ≈Åukasz Siewierski known as @maldr0id have us covered, he posted a list of interesting malware samples on his blog.

item.title: Setting Up a Malware Analysis Environment
item.description: Summary This is not meant to be a step by step tutorial rather I wanted to make a good listing of the most useful tools I am using daily for malware analysis. In order to do malware analysis on android we only need 3+1 things. A computer, right tools, a malware sample (and brains). In this post I will help you setup a malware analysis Virtual Machine with all essential tools to get you started.

item.title: Welcome to my humble blog
item.description: Content Hello MS/Mr. Viewer, I welcome you to this very blog you see in front of your eye(s). In this blog I will be uploading malware analysis, android internals,android applications and tools I create in my free time. As every project I do I always start with huge excitement which gradually fades. I expect nothing different for this project but I will try to be consistent with a couple posts per month.
